message.content:
cs.GT, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.MA 

This paper involves game theory, mechanism design, and approximation algorithms, which are all relevant to the cs.GT (Game Theory) sub-category. The use of preference lists and the objective of minimizing total cost suggest that the paper could also be classified under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The problem involves facility location, which is a classic topic in the cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) sub-category. The design of a strategyproof mechanism is related to social choice theory, which falls under the cs.LG (Learning) sub-category. Finally, the use of approximation algorithms suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems).
